mapper.select: SELECT IU.ID AS ID, IU.NAME AS NAME, IUC.STATUS AS STATUS, IUC.START_DATE AS START_DATE, IUC.END_DATE AS END_DATE, IUG.SUB AS SUB, IUG.GRADE AS GRADE, IUG.PROFESSOR AS PROFESSOR FROM INHA_USR AS IU INNER JOIN INHA_USR_CERT AS IUC ON (IUC.INHA_USR_ID = IU.ID) INNER JOIN INHA_USR_GRADE AS IUG ON (IUG.INHA_USR_ID = IU.ID) WHERE IU.ID = #{orgUserId};
